title: ‘The Real Ruth Edwards’ Opens Up About Her Gravel Experiment and The Lure of the Road
content:
'Racing doesn't have to define me': Former US champ explains how she found 'The Real Ruth' in 2024 and why the gravel scene wasn't for her.

Read the full article at ‘The Real Ruth Edwards’ Opens Up About Her Gravel Experiment and The Lure of the Road on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
